NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 AVENS: Friends, the excavation of Giant's Deep's core is complete. At this rate, I am confident we will be able to complete the Deep Storm Station before the Sun Station! 2 1 MALLOW: I hope so too.. Without the Deep Storm Station giving us the confidence to follow in our ambitions, we won't be able to use the Sun Station at all! 3 2 CASSAVA: Avens, Mallow: kindly focus on the task of reinforcing the station's walls. We are surrounded by oceans of pressure - we must fortify the station's integrity with great care! 4 1 CASSAVA: Daz, Clary is almost done installing the new warp receiver within the Deep Storm Station. Once it is ready, it should connect us with the warp transmitter on the surface. 5 4 CLARY: Of note: we will require some assistance in charging a return warp that will allow us to return to the planet's surface! 6 5 DAZ: Have no fear, Clary: I am already ready to do so! I cannot wait to reunite with my beloved Cassava! 7 6 CLARY: You have my gratitude, Daz. With my work here done, I shall be glad to take my leave from two sets of gelatinous Nomai! CB_EX5 5 CB_EX6 2 CONV R3 5 CONV R3.5 2
